entry.title: Bitcoin at POS using BIP70, NFC and offline payments - implementer feedback
entry.summary: It seems like there are many deviations from the BIP70 specification, which is a brand new technology. The speaker suggests that a BIP70 conformance suite is needed to address these issues. Additionally, it appears that Bluetooth is used to directly check for 'ack.'
